channel.title: scripts on ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in scripts on ZAP

item.title: Signing Requests using RSA Keys
item.description: A new script in the community-scripts repository enables the signing of outgoing requests with RSA keys, addressing the challenge of testing applications that require this functionality.

item.title: Hacking ZAP - ZAP Extender Scripts
item.description: An overview of ZAP Extender scripts with examples. Use ZAP as a web server, subscribe to internal ZAP events, and more!
